creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Augustus L. Searle
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Snuff bottle, one of a pair, turquoise, with turquoise stopper.  Body divided into three zones of carving separated by bands of dots and fluting.  Conventionalized floral and leaf design.  Shaped teakwood base into which bottle fits snugly.
title: Snuff Bottle, one of a pair
